title: Supper luxary house for sale
details:
This beautyful house is perfect for a quite living, situated just 5 km away from Mawanella town towards Kandy and half an hour to Kandy by bus or a car, three minutes walk to Kandy Colombo Rd, perfect neighbourhood.
This propert consists with two back to back seperate buildings, main building and the other one which consists servent's quaters and living area, kitchen for local traditional cooking, laundry, servent's bath, store room etc.
Full of extras and just too many to mention, must see it.
